TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HostFileChangeMonitor extends System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor
Public NotInheritable Class HostFileChangeMonitor Inherits FileChangeMonitor

summary.span: 監控目錄和檔案路徑，並通知快取受監控項目發生變更的資訊。

span.span: Monitors directories and file paths and notifies the cache of changes to the monitored items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是具體實作型別。The class is a concrete implementation of the type. 此類別已密封，因此無法擴充。This class is sealed, therefore it cannot be extended. 這個類別是很有用，如果您想要使用現有的快取實作，並監視檔案和目錄的變更。This class is useful if you want to use an existing cache implementation and to monitor files and directories for changes. 針對每個指定的檔案或目錄路徑類別觸發變更通知，如果發生任何下列變更：For each specified file or directory path, the class triggers a change notification if any of the following changes occur: - 受監視的檔案或目錄變更的名稱。The name of the monitored file or directory changes. - 指定的檔案或目錄不存在時，監視器已建立，但是稍後建立。The specified file or directory did not exist at the time the monitor was created, but was created later. 也就是說，檔案或目錄已建立的受監視的項目範圍內。In other words, a file or directory was created in the scope of the monitored items. - 受監視的檔案大小變更。The size of a monitored file changed. - 受監視的檔案的內容變更，或變更受監視的目錄的內容。The contents of a monitored file changed, or the contents of a monitored directory changed. - 已變更檔案或目錄的存取控制清單 (ACL)。The access control list (ACL) of the file or directory was changed. - 受監視的檔案或目錄已刪除。The monitored file or directory was deleted. 如果有太多變更受監視的檔案或目錄發生在此同時，執行個體可以遺失的特定變更追蹤。If too many changes occur for the monitored file or directory at the same time, the instance can lose track of specific changes. 在此案例中，類別觸發程序的變更通知。In this scenario, the class triggers a change notification. 此案例中會更容易發生時執行個體監視目錄，並在短時間內發生目錄結構的範圍中的許多變更。This scenario is more likely to occur when the instance monitors a directory, and many changes occur in the scope of the directory structure in a short period of time. 因為目的類別只是用來表示，在一組受監視的檔案和目錄之間有所變更，它並不重要，不會擷取特定變更的相關詳細資料。Because the purpose of the class is only to signal that something has changed among the set of monitored files and directories, it is not considered important that details about a specific change are not captured. 目的類別是要提供通知的狀態變更，因此可以收回快取項目 （或項目）。The purpose of the class is to provide notification that state changed so that a cache entry (or entries) can be evicted. 因為類別不會指出到底有什麼變更、 內部變更追蹤溢位無關。Because the class does not indicate exactly what changed, internal-change tracking overflow is irrelevant. 當您提供的路徑執行個體、 目錄和檔案的路徑必須是目錄或檔案的完整路徑。When you supply paths to a instance, the directory and file paths must be full paths to the directory or file. 不允許相對路徑和萬用字元。Relative paths and wildcard characters in paths are not allowed. 當類別會在 ASP.NET 應用程式，用於受監視項目的存取權的 Windows 身分識別是 ASP.NET 應用程式的應用程式識別碼。When the class is used in an ASP.NET application, the Windows identity that is used for access to monitored items is the application identity for the ASP.NET application. 換句話說，應用程式身分識別將會是下列其中一項：In other words, the application identity will be one of the following: - 處理序身分識別。The process identity. - 設定的應用程式身分識別。The configured application identity. - 如果應用程式正在執行從 UNC 共用 UNC 認證。The UNC credential if the application is running from a UNC share. 當類別用在非 ASP.NET 應用程式中，類別在內部用來監視檔案。When the class is used in a non-ASP.NET application, the class is used internally to monitor files. 如此一來，任何存取控制清單 (ACL) 套用至受監視的檔案或目錄會套用至目前執行緒的 Windows 身分識別。As a result, whatever access control list (ACL) applies to a monitored file or directory is applied to the Windows identity of the current thread. > [!NOTE] > 呼叫端必須具備適當層級的程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 權限，必須有 NTFS 權限的所有受監視的目錄與路徑。Callers must have the appropriate level of code access security (CAS) permissions and must have NTFS permissions to all monitored directories and paths. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用快取項目物件來監視檔案系統上的來源資料 （也就是檔案） 的狀態。The following example creates a cache item that uses a object to monitor the state of the source data (which is a file) on the file system. 快取項目會定義使用提供快取項目的收回和到期的詳細資料的物件。The cache entry is defined using a object to provide eviction and expiration details for the cache entry. [!code-csharp[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> filePaths) cil managed
Public Sub New (filePaths As IList(Of String))

param.name: filePaths
param.span: 包含一個或多個要監控之目錄路徑或檔案路徑的清單。

span.span: A list that contains one or more directory paths or file paths to monitor.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫建構函式必須提供非 null 值給`filePaths`參數。Calls to the constructor must provide a non-null value for the `filePaths` parameter. 最少的建構函式會驗證傳給它，然後監視這些路徑來初始化集合中的路徑。At a minimum, the constructor validates the collection of paths that is passed into it and then initializes monitoring for those paths. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式會執行只有字串的路徑名稱的驗證。The constructor performs only string validation of the path name. 它不會規範化路徑，或驗證路徑存在。It does not canonicalize paths or validate that the paths exist.

exception.span: 清單中的路徑是 或空字串。

span.span: A path in the list is or an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property FilePaths As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得已經傳遞給 建構函式的目錄和檔案路徑集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of directories and file paths that was passed to the constructor.

value.span: 目錄和檔案路徑的集合。

span.span: A collection of directories and file paths.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LastModified As DateTimeOffset
public: virtual property DateTimeOffset LastModified { DateTimeOffset get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得唯讀值，這個值表示所監控的檔案或路徑上次寫入的時間。

span.span: Gets a read-only value that indicates the last write time of a monitored file or path.

value.span: 所監控的檔案或路徑上次寫入的時間。

span.span: The last write time of a monitored file or path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果檔案變更監視器會監視多個檔案或路徑，這個屬性會傳回的最新的寫入時間集中的所有檔案和路徑。If a file-change monitor is monitoring multiple files or paths, this property returns the most recent write time in the set of all files and paths.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UniqueId As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UniqueId { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得 執行個體的識別項，該識別項的基準是監控目錄和檔案路徑組。

span.span: Gets an identifier for the instance that is based on the set of monitored directories and file paths.
An identifier for the change monitor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組成的字串屬性值建構自下列部分：The string that makes up the property value is constructed from the following parts: - 檔案或目錄的路徑。A file or directory path. - 最新的寫入時間的 UTC 時間以刻度為單位，但做為十六進位字串表示。The most recent write time in UTC time, measured as ticks but represented as a hexadecimal string. - 檔案大小，以十六進位字串表示。The file size, represented as a hexadecimal string. 如果檔案變更監視器會監視多個路徑，這個屬性所傳回的資訊會串連成單一字串的所有受監視的目錄和檔案路徑。If a file change monitor is monitoring multiple paths, the information returned by this property is concatenated into a single string for all the monitored directories and file paths.
